com.sitewhere.spi.device

Interface ISite

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMetadataProvider, IMetadataProviderEntity, ISiteWhereEntity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Site

    public interface ISite
extends IMetadataProviderEntity
    A construct that groups together related device assignments and provides common settings for them.
